comment.author: 43386996@N08
comment._content: Ahh my old hometown...There is a V&D right next to this town hall and there is a bar too!!  In Town HALL!!!  They make great Mojitos!

comment.author: 39839593@N00
comment._content: The gable is the longest Renaissance gable in the Netherlands, the architect was Lieven de Key. Unfortunately the City Hall burnt down In 1929, only the gable was left standing. They built a new City Hall, but used the old gable.
